title: Week 12 preview
itunes:title: Week 12 preview
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Chris Wesseling & Gregg Rosenthal – go game-by-game previewing each week 12 matchup including an important AFC west matchup between the Broncos and the Chiefs, and a second straight prime-time appearance for the Packers as they take on the Eagles in Philadelphia. And, as always, the heroes reveal which team is their “Lock of the Week.”

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
